text: wa'iidha balagh al'atfal minkum sina alahtilam waltaklif bial'ahkam alshareiati, faealayhim 'ana yastadhinuu 'iidha 'araduu aldukhul fi kli al'awqat kama yastadhin alkubaru, wakama ybyin allah adab alastidhan ybyin allah taealaa lakum ayatiha. wallah ealim bima yuslih eibadahu, hakim fi tashrieiha
